Package jrtr.glrenderer

An standard OpenGL renderer implementing the jrtr interfaces.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GLRenderContext
    Implements a RenderContext (a renderer) using OpenGL version 3 (or later).
    GLRenderPanel
    Implementats the RenderPanel interface using OpenGL.
    GLShader
    Manages OpenGL shaders.
    GLTexture
    Manages OpenGL textures.
    GLVertexArrayObject
    A utility class to encapsulate an OpenGL "vertex array object" (VAO).
    GLVertexData
    An implementation of VertexData which adds the handle to the OpenGL vertex array object (VAO) of this vertex data to it.
    VRRenderContext
    This class implements a RenderContext (a renderer) using OpenGL version 3 (or later).
    VRRenderPanel  

Package jrtr.glrenderer Description

An standard OpenGL renderer implementing the jrtr interfaces.
